details: Visit the iconic Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage site and one of the Seven Wonders of the World.
Explore the Pink City, known for its beautiful palaces and vibrant markets.
Relax on the stunning beaches and enjoy the vibrant nightlife of Goa.
Experience the backwaters and lush landscapes of God's Own Country.
Enjoy the scenic beauty and adventure activities in this popular hill station.
The Yoga Capital of the World, known for its spiritual significance and adventure sports.
Known as the City of Lakes, Udaipur is famous for its palaces and romantic setting.
Explore the rich history and vibrant culture of Mysore, especially during the Dasara festival.
